text: Yeonsul-eun gileum-i anira, uril bakkul su issneun gonggo-il ppun-ida. (Prophecy is not a path, but a space where we can change ourselves.)
Unmyeong-eun jakku malla-jiji anhneunda. Danineun geu ane issneun gil-eul chaj-aya handa. (Destiny doesn't keep changing. You just have to find the path within it.)
source: The God of High School - Mori Jin

text: Masa-neun yeonsul-eun dangsin-i al-abyeolyeogo haji anhneun geos-ida. (The true prophecy is what you don't try to understand.)
Mul-ui heuleum cheoleom, unmyeong-eun jigeumeul malhago masa-neun yeonsul-eun milaeleul malhanda. (Like the flow of water, fate speaks of now, while true prophecy speaks of tomorrow.)
Yeonsul-eun dangsin-ui nun-e mueos-i boineun-ga-e gwanhan geos-i anila, dangsin-i boji anh-eun geos-e gwanhan geos-ida. (Prophecy is not about what you see, but about what you fail to see.)
Like a computer rebooting, sleep clears the errors of yesterday and installs the hope of tomorrow.
Jami deun hueeya yeonghoni jeonghwadoego momi dasi taeeonanda - Only after falling asleep does the soul purify and the body rebirth itself.
